mapper.select: select id, sUsername, sPassword, sRealName, sPhone, sEmail, iGender, iAge, sAvatar, sProvince, sCity, iGraduationYear, sMajor, sEducation, sSchoolID, iRoleType, iStatus, sDirection, sDescription, dCreateTime, dUpdateTime from t_user
mapper.update: insert into t_user ( id, sUsername, sPassword, sRealName, sPhone, sEmail, iGender, iAge, sAvatar, sProvince, sCity, iGraduationYear, sMajor, sEducation, sSchoolID, iRoleType, iStatus, sDirection, sDescription, dCreateTime, dUpdateTime ) values ( #{id}, #{sUsername}, #{sPassword}, #{sRealName}, #{sPhone}, #{sEmail}, #{iGender}, #{iAge}, #{sAvatar}, #{sProvince}, #{sCity}, #{iGraduationYear}, #{sMajor}, #{sEducation}, #{sSchoolID}, #{iRoleType}, #{iStatus}, #{sDirection}, #{sDescription}, #{dCreateTime}, #{dUpdateTime} )

update t_user set sUsername = #{sUsername}, sPassword = #{sPassword}, sRealName = #{sRealName}, sPhone = #{sPhone}, sEmail = #{sEmail}, iGender = #{iGender}, iAge = #{iAge}, sAvatar = #{sAvatar}, sProvince = #{sProvince}, sCity = #{sCity}, iGraduationYear = #{iGraduationYear}, sMajor = #{sMajor}, sEducation = #{sEducation}, sSchoolID = #{sSchoolID}, sDirection = #{sDirection}, sDescription = #{sDescription}, iStatus = #{iStatus}, dUpdateTime = #{dUpdateTime} where id = #{id}
